page.title: 14DENTIST,MILKMAN,COUNCILLOR
page.content: Mr.M.J.Mooney is 1 of 2 dentists who work at Sprotbrough Rd surgery. He has been working there for 3.5 years (36 hours per week).He has 4 weeks holiday and is paid monthly.His patients are from the National Health. He sees 30 to 40 people per day.There are 2 dentists and 2 nurses in his practice. Mrs Hall is a Local Councillor for the Labour Party ,she is also the chairman of the school governors. She attends 10-12 meetings per week and visits as many schools as she can. Mr C.A.Watson is the milkman for Northern Daries. He works from 4.30 am-1.30pm with 1 week holiday.He sells about 4000 pints a week as well as cream , eggs and orange. He delivers all over in the Doncaster area.
